instruction: Try taking the Aripiprazole 400 mg injection right after school next month to manage drowsiness, allowing the heaviest effect to hit overnight.

attributes.comment: Try taking the Aripiprazole 400 mg injection right after school next month to manage drowsiness, allowing the heaviest effect to hit overnight.

instruction: Track sugary drinks in the Daylio app and provide screenshots at the next appointment.

attributes.comment: Track sugary drinks in the Daylio app and provide screenshots at the next appointment.

instruction: Next depot injection is due no later than May third, with a reminder sent to the patient's phone and foster parent portal.

attributes.narrative: Next depot injection is due no later than May third, with a reminder sent to the patient's phone and foster parent portal.

instruction: Fax a one-page standing order signed by the clinician to the district health for the school nurse to administer the depot.

attributes.title: Fax standing order to district health
attributes.comment: Fax a one-page standing order signed by the clinician to the district health for the school nurse to administer the depot.

instruction: If sleepiness persists past day three or if waist size increases, message through the portal. Sudden restlessness could be akathisia, not ADHD, and should be reported early.

attributes.comment: If sleepiness persists past day three or if waist size increases, message through the portal. Sudden restlessness could be akathisia, not ADHD, and should be reported early.

instruction: Issue a letter stating the prescription to cover the patient in case of a drug screen.

attributes.title: Issue a letter for prescription coverage
attributes.comment: State the prescription to cover the patient in case of a drug screen.
